text:
AFAICT the reasoning behind the `float` choice was simply what you said about avoiding adding precision

> But what’s the argument that Dual numbers should disagree with ordinary ones?

there probably isn't one :grin:

text: OK! I wondered a bit if it pre-dated `Base.float`, and thus made the choice on a clean slate. Anyway, I will make an issue.
